Hi, my
name is Elias.

  • About Me

    I’m Elias, a software engineer passionate about building scalable systems and creating intuitive solutions to everyday problems. I'm a rising junior at Santa Clara University studying Computer Science & Engineering and currently am a software development intern at The Hivery in Mill Valley, CA.


    On campus and beyond, I’ve been passionate about creating spaces that help others grow in technology. I’ve mentored peers in computer science courses, sharing insights on systems programming and data structures, and extended that impact by creating a YouTube channel dedicated to teaching programming concepts. I also use LinkedIn as a platform to share lessons learned and advice for students entering the field, building on years of tutoring and mentoring experience.


    I’ve gained hands-on experience through internships, hackathons, and collaborations where I worked on building scalable backend systems, optimizing algorithms and queries, and developing fullstack applications.

    Experience

    Software Development Intern

    The Hivery Mill Valley, CA 2024 - Present Internship

    Developing scalable backend systems and fullstack applications using modern web technologies. Working on optimizing database queries and implementing efficient algorithms for production systems.

    Python Flask MySQL AWS

    Computer Science Tutor & Mentor

    Santa Clara University Santa Clara, CA 2023 - Present Academic

    Mentoring peers in computer science courses, focusing on systems programming and data structures. Creating educational content and providing guidance to help students succeed in challenging technical coursework.

    C++ Data Structures Algorithms Systems Programming

    Educational Content Creator

    YouTube & LinkedIn Remote 2023 - Present Content Creation

    Creating programming tutorials and sharing technical insights through video content and written posts. Building a community of learners and providing valuable resources for students entering the field.

    Content Creation Teaching Community Building

    Hackathon Participant

    Various Events Bay Area, CA 2022 - Present Competition

    Participating in competitive programming events and hackathons, collaborating on innovative projects and building fullstack applications under time constraints. Gained experience in rapid prototyping and team collaboration.

    React Node.js Python Rapid Prototyping
